verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] headed to the heartland today to address the National Rifle Association 's annual convention .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: headed] [ARG1: to the heartland] [ARGM-TMP: today] [ARGM-PRP: to address the National Rifle Association 's annual convention] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is headed to the heartland today to [V: address] [ARG1: the National Rifle Association 's annual convention] .
